content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/sale-small/Year=2016/Quarter=Q3/Month=9/Day=20160930/sale-small-20160930-snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TransactionDate, ProductId,
        CAST(SUM(ProfitAmount) AS decimal(18,2)) AS [(sum) Profit],
        CAST(AVG(ProfitAmount) AS decimal(18,2)) AS [(avg) Profit],
        SUM(Quantity) AS [(sum) Quantity]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/sale-small/Year=2016/Quarter=Q3/Month=9/Day=20160930/sale-small-20160930-snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [r] GROUP BY r.TransactionDate, r.ProductId;



SELECT
    COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/sale-small/Year=2019/*/*/*/*',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [r] ;



GO

create DATABASE demo_serverless
GO






USE silverdatabase
go


SELECT TOP (100) * FROM [dbo].[orders]
